item.title: CRM
item.description: score:-63 Chances: Salesforce.com (CRM) has healthy fundamentals and upward estimate revisions. The company’s merger synergies with the recent Slack deal will be key for future growth. Rising corporate spending on digital transformation projects has boosted CRM stock. AI advancements have had a major impact on productivity and are expected to benefit companies like Salesforce.
